0.text: You enrolled in CourtSMS. To opt out text OPTOUT. To change your reminders frequency text CHANGE. Other questions? Text HELP

1.text: Text ONE to receive a message daily. Text TWO to receive messages every two days. Text WEEK to recieve messages once a week.

2.text: If you opt out of you will be required to call 1-800-888-8888 daily to comply with your super-vision. Text OK to opt out or STAY to stay.

4.text: Thank you! You will now receive messages daily. Text CHANGE to change or HELP for other help.

5.text: Thank you! You will now receive messages every two days. Text CHANGE to change or HELP for other help.

6.text: Thank you! You will now receive messages weekly. Text CHANGE to change or HELP for other help.

7.text: To comply with your supervision call 1-800-888-8888 daily to check in and receive updates to your court date.

8.text: Thanks for staying with us! If you have questions text HELP or call 1-800-888-8888.

3.text: Questions? Text DATE for your date. Text BRING for what to bring. All other questions call 1-800-888-8888

9.text: Your court time is on Tuesday, February 14th, 2016. Please arrive at 9:20am at 2001 State Street Room S4200. You will need to bring x, y, z with you.

10.text: You will need to bring x, y, z with you.

*.text: I'm not sure what you were asking. Type MENU to return to the main menu.
